hours_text:
## Location

Madison Museum of Contemporary Art, 227 State Street, Madison, WI 53703

MMoCA is adjacent to [Overture Center for the Arts](http://web.archive.org/web/20250806144143/http://www.overturecenter.org/). Please enter MMoCA’s galleries through the main entrance on State Street.

* * *

## Hours

**REGULAR GALLERY HOURS  
** Wednesday: 12–6 PM   
Thursday: 12–9 PM   
Friday: 12–6 PM  
Saturday: 10 AM – 6 PM  
Sunday: 12–6 PM  
Monday–Tuesday: Closed

**HOLIDAYS**  
The Museum is closed on Martin Luther King Jr. Day, Memorial Day, Juneteenth, Labor Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas Eve, Christmas, and New Year’s Day.

**WINTER WEATHER  
** MMoCA will close when Madison Metro cancels bus service due to weather. MMoCA’s Rooftop Sculpture Garden may be closed due to inclement weather, including icy conditions.

* * *

## Admission

Thanks to generous support from our community, there is no admission fee for Museum exhibitions. Most Museum education programs are also free. 

[Current Exhibitions](http://web.archive.org/web/20250806144143/https://www.mmoca.org/art/)

[Upcoming Events](http://web.archive.org/web/20250806144143/https://www.mmoca.org/events/)

* * *

## Visit

**STORING ITEMS**  
The Museum has a free, self-managed coat check room without lockers. It is located behind the Lobby Desk and across from the elevator. Larger backpacks can be stored behind the Lobby Desk. Belongings behind the desk will be monitored by a museum staff member. Prohibited items must be kept i...
collections_text:
[Learn More](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114114425/https://www.mmoca.org/domes/)

#### Winter Domes

Bring up to seven of your favorite people to a VIP experience atop the Museum. Surround yourself with the winter sky, the Madison skyline, and engaging works of art inside a heated private dome. Your 90-minute reservation starts with a selection of locally sourced cheeses, dried fruit, nuts, and cured meats to nibble on as you order specialty drinks and cocktails from the dome-side bar service.

[Learn More](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114114425/https://www.mmoca.org/domes/)

[Learn More](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114114425/https://www.mmoca.org/events/weaving-workshop/)

#### Weaving Workshop with Lauren Paul and the Textile Arts Center

Experiment with color, form, and material as you learn to weave on handheld looms in this free workshop. Inspired by artist Sabina Ott’s celebration of her artistic community, this session is led by artist Lauren Paul and presented in partnership with the Textile Arts Center of Madison.

[Learn More](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114114425/https://www.mmoca.org/events/weaving-workshop/)

[Learn More](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114114425/https://www.mmoca.org/news/mmoca-mourns-the-loss-of-w-jerome-frautschi/)

#### MMoCA mourns the loss of W. Jerome Frautschi

Frautschi’s visionary philanthropy created an iconic and lasting home for contemporary art in Madison.
